QuestData.Title: The Cursed Shard
QuestData.Description: <A unnatural metallic shard catches your eye as it shifts from color to color. At your touch, one end of the shard swells in size before melting away. Droplets hit the ground with a hiss and a noxious stench invades your nostrils.$b$bSomeone in Dalaran who works with metals should be able to tell you more.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Cursed Shard to Arcanomancer Vridiel in Dalaran on the Broken Isles.
